text:
Task 5 (Forms + Pricing) is complete. All 4 components created, build verified, committed as `11f7db5`.

**Files created:**
- `src/components/forms/NewsletterSignup.astro` — compact email-only signup, single row (email + button) on desktop, stacked on mobile, visually-hidden label for accessibility, bg-alt background
- `src/components/forms/QuoteRequest.astro` — extended quote form with name/email/phone/service grid (2-col desktop), budget range dropdown, message textarea, custom select arrows via data URI SVG
- `src/components/pricing/PricingTable.astro` — side-by-side plan cards with highlighted variant (accent border, "Popular" badge, scale(1.02)), checkmark features, outlined vs filled CTA buttons
- `src/components/pricing/PricingCards.astro` — simpler equal-width cards with bullet features, description text, filled CTA buttons, bg-alt background

**CSS compliance:** All values use `var(--*)`. Only acceptable hardcoded values: `1px` borders, font-weight, unitless line-height, structural CSS. Input styling matches ContactForm.astro pattern exactly. BEM naming, section + __inner wrapper, 768px breakpoint, data-vf-component/data-vf-file attributes all present. No JavaScript.
